attributes.action: Stop Human Rights violations in Bermuda
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bermuda is allowing people to be sentenced and put in jail without ever having a trial. This is a violation of their own constitution and human rights. The law which allows this to happen is The Debtors Act 1973 so they think in Bermuda that it is perfectly legal. We have to stop the Bermuda Government. Urge the PM to impose direct rule.
